text.0_Chapter, 0_Paragraph: The heavens are exalted, and the earth to the valley, and the breadth of the wise in heart is unexplored.
text.0_Chapter, 1_Paragraph: Loves the embrace of the roots of the quarry of his humanity.
text.0_Chapter, 2_Paragraph: There is no research into his wisdom and many of the heart research that is with him.
text.0_Chapter, 3_Paragraph: Many thoughts in the heart of the righteous, righteousness, love.
text.0_Chapter, 4_Paragraph: In him shall the Holy One of Israel be sanctified, and in his lips shall the God of glory be glorified....
text.0_Chapter, 5_Paragraph: There is no wisdom, and there is no counsel, and there is no understanding, and they have no shepherd.
text.0_Chapter, 6_Paragraph: Whoever humbles himself in the fullness of the whole will deny him.
